title: Tank (of Tank & The Bangas)
itunes:title: Tank (of Tank & The Bangas)
description:
In the words of our fearless leader Questlove, "not since the days of Fishbone in their prime, have you seen a band exude this kind of energy" and evoke such a range of emotions as Tank and the Bangas. This episode we are joined by that band's own fearless leader and her many voices, Tarriona "Tank" Ball. Listen as she breaks down her band, why no storm will stop her from living in her hometown of New Orleans, gets some great advice on getting along from Quest and even saves a life DURING the interview! Yup she dope so listen up!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
